column3: Hmm, so this will break with older versions of brew? Considering that they "will maintain python2, python3 and python@3 aliases", I am slightly -0 on this.

> Hmm, so this will break with older versions of brew?

Isn't brew self-updating? From my experience, the number of people using old versions of stuff on MacOSX is really low.

But yes, there's no hurry to do this if they maintain the `python3` alias.
